title: Spinors, Relativity and Nonlocality
abstract: The Ryder relation between left- and right- spinors has been generalized in my previous works. On this basis Ahluwalia presented a physical content following from this generalization. It is related to non-locality. A similar conclusion can be drawn on the basis of a generalization of the Sakurai-Gersten consideration. I correct several calculating and conceptual misunderstandings of the previous works.
